channel.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Router on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Hardware_Router on SoftLayer API

item.title: allowAccessToNetworkStorage
item.description:
REST Example 

curl -g -u $SL_USER:$SL_APIKEY -X POST -d '{"parameters": [SoftLayer_Network_Storage]}' \
'https://api.softlayer.com/rest/v3.1/SoftLayer_Hardware_Router/{SoftLayer_Hardware_RouterID}/allowAccessToNetworkStorage'
